org.joo.steak.framework.event

Interface StateEngineDispatcher

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StateManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateEngineDispatcher, AbstractStateManager, DefaultStateManager

    public interface StateEngineDispatcher
    This is mainly used by StateManager to dispatch an event when it starts/finishes
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStateEngineListener(StateEngineListener listener)
      Add a listener for StateEngineEvent
      void dispatchStateChangedEvent(StateChangedEvent event)
      Dispatch a StateChangedEvent to all listeners when the state changed
      void dispatchStateEngineFinishEvent(StateChangedEvent event)
      Dispatch a StateChangedEvent to all listeners when the state engine finishes
      void dispatchStateEngineStartEvent(StateContext stateContext)
      Dispatch an event to all listeners when the state engine starts
      void removeStateEngineListener(StateEngineListener listener)
      Remove a listener so that it will no longer receive state engine event

    • Method Detail

        Add a listener for StateEngineEvent

        Remove a listener so that it will no longer receive state engine event
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be removed
